abstract: The Obama administration’s public-private partnership plan to buy up toxic assets still lacks some critical details and that became apparent on Thursday afternoon during a conference call with bankers and investors that was led by Sheila C. Bair, the chairwoman of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration’s public-private partnership plan to buy up toxic assets still lacks some critical details and that became apparent on Thursday afternoon during a conference call with bankers and investors that was led by Sheila C. Bair, the chairwoman of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.

headline.main: Devil Is in the Details of the Toxic-Asset Plan
